name: Darling Pet: Choose your love
description:
"What if your cute pets turn into hot boys?"
Enjoy Lucydream’s new romance thriller!

Darling Pet, the romantic interactive otome game of dating cute pet boys and full of thrilling simulations, is finally ready to download!
Everything begins with the animals you rescue.

‘Wait, do I have to live with them?’

Find out the ending of this story, and where it takes you to.
Whatever it is, it all depends on your choice!

:: About the game

Darling Pet is a visual-novel based romantic simulator game featuring attractive illustration and high-quality sound effects. Users’ choices decide the whole plot of the story, especially how the ending will be illustrated. Game’s hidden episodes and thrilling plots maximize the curiosity and the excitement that the users get to feel when trying to solve their ways to the end of the game.

:: Story Keypoints

1. A romantic & thrilling story that lasts for long!
2. interactive chat stories with the four different love interests!
3. high- quality illustrations that will stimulate users’ empathy even more!
4. mood-setting sound effects and background music that makes the game more dynamic.

:: Plot

In the middle of your everyday life,
You rescued animals from a suspicious building.
But the animals…turned into four men!

"Who believes such nonsense?"
"Get out of my house right now!"

From the animals to the
Dangerous neighborhood that follows them.
Can you keep your peaceful daily life?

Find out the special ending of a romance thriller
In a way you’ve never experienced before!

:: Darling Pet is for those who…

Want to play an interactive otome game that’s romantic but mysterious and dangerous!
Are looking for a brand new love story game with choices in mysterious fantasy!
Want to collect all the secret endings with special episodes!
Are interested in fateful love in desperate situations!
Want to try an otome roleplay episode game with your own choices!
Love to play a dating otome interactive game with romance fantasy stories!
Want to experience how to save four charming pet boys in a dangerous situation with various thrilling episodes!
Like watching anime or novels about love stories!
